pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plan Sample Size for Task fMRI Research using Bayesian Updating // Calculate the precision in mean differences (raw or Cohen's D) and correlation coefficients for different sample sizes. Uses permutations of the collected functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) region of interest data. Method described in Klapwijk, Jongerling, Hoijtink and Crone (2024) doi:10.31234/osf.io/cz32t.
